Title: Relates to insurance reimbursement for vaccination for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2
Summary: Requires insurance reimbursement for vaccination for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2.
LawCode: Amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §365-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the social services law, in relation to insurance reimbursement for vaccination for severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2
